DESCRIPTION: Strap into the Rome Women's Lo-Fi Rocker Snowboard if you don't discriminate between sending big jumps in the park and slashing fresh powder in the trees. This poppy, yet playful freestyle deck features balanced twin geometry for riding switch without compromise in the park. However, just because the Lo-Fi Rocker excels at jumps and jibs doesn't mean it can't slay the entire mountain. It's equally adept at dropping into open bowls and dicing up deep glades on powder days thanks to its FreePop Rocker. The FreePop Rocker profile keeps the tips from submerging, should you find yourself riding on powder days and stomping landings in untracked snow. This hybrid profile places flat camber underfoot for a stable, predictable feel when you're straight-lining kickers and hauling at high speeds. Just after the binding inserts, the board transitions to rocker to the tip and tail, allowing you to float through fresh snow, as well as link turns and stomp landings without catching unexpectedly. Inside this freestyle specialist, the snappy Pop Core Matrix blends long poplar wood with three zones of low-density wood. The StraightBiax Laminate preserves the board's playful nature, allowing you to flex the board torsionally for effortless butters and presses. Helping you boost over slow signs (don't get caught!) and clear kickers, the Bamboo Single Barrel HotRod is milled directly into the nose and tail for spring-like response.
NAME: Rome Snowboards Women's Lo Fi Rocker Snowboard

DESCRIPTION: For the past four years Lib Ripper Travis Rice followed our world's hydrological cycle to the furthest reaches of the planet pushing himself and the pursuit of snowboarding to new heights on Lib Tech, the world's best boards. Travis and the crew's hard work and passion for next level snowboarding and cinematic production have culminated in the masterpiece that is "The Fourth Phase". Mervin's world renown photographer Tim Zimmerman was there to document it all. In celebration of completing this four year project Travis and Tim selected a collection of images that capture the spirit of their hydrological adventures and worked with the art director of The Fourth Phase book Joel Brinson and Lib Tech Art Director Annette Veihelmann to create this unique limited edition Travis Rice HP pro model. DESCRIPTION: Based on the legendary pow-specific shape of Salomon's Derby Snowboard, the Salomon Split Splitboard keeps you floating on snorkel-deep days with its tapered twin shape and Flat Out Rocker profile. While most split boards feature a directional shape, the Salomon Split keeps you centered along the effective edge with a slightly pulled-in tail for easy float without sacrificing its ability to grip on hardpack, should you encounter sketchy snow in the backcountry. The 147 and 156-centimeter boards feature 10-millimeters of taper, while the 162-centimeter board has 12-millimeters of taper for a bit more float. Available in three distinct sizes, the 147-centimeter Split uses Salomon's Rocket Science shaping, allowing you to ride a much smaller board in the backcountry for less fatigue on the skin up. This unique shaping widens the board for enhanced float without the weight of a longer board, giving you a downsized rocket for slicing through tight trees and chutes. Inside this backcountry ripper, you'll find an Aspen SLCT core that's composed of FSC-certified wood for lightweight performance. Popster core profiling gives the Split extra boost when you're snapping ollies, while rugged ABS sidewalls withstand regular thrashings when you're clanking 'em together in touring mode or bumping into branches and stumps. Additionally, you'll find Salomon's fastest Sintered EG base that's finished with Electra for unparalleled glide over a wide variety of snow conditions in the backcountry. Note that the Split comes with custom skins to maximize touring efficiency.
NAME: Salomon Snowboards Split Splitboard One Color, 163cm

DESCRIPTION: While taking the Bataleon Airobic Snowboard through the park and crushing every feature in your path takes almost no effort, it is still technically exercise, so don't feel like you haven't earned those apres beers at the end of the day. With Triple Base Technology (TBT), the Airobic's profile starts with traditional camber for reliable pop and edge hold, then turns the edges up toward the tip and tail to eliminate hang-ups when riding flat base, maintaining that forgiving feel of rocker without sacrificing the benefits of camber. Park 3BT features a mellow version of camber for a looser feel on rails and stability on big jumps. A true twin shape allows for unrestricted switch riding, and blunt tips keep the swing weight down. Biax glass gives the board a soft, even flex for proper presses and easy turns. The Core Core uses poplar wood for pop and power, while the added beech hardwood runs from tip-to-tail for comfortable lateral flex and added strength to the board's backbone. DESCRIPTION: Put in work anywhere on the mountain with the fun and forgiving Rome Mechanic Snowboard. DESCRIPTION: Camp Seven Roots CRC Snowboard : With tons of upgrades, an improved rocker story, and a revamped core, the Roots returns to dominate every part of the mountain! Now utilizing the CRCX camber story (full rocker in the center and mild camber in the tip and tail) the Roots CRCX rides loose, free and fun in flats, while providing maximum hold when carving. The DD2 Core, the lightest core in our line, is made up of tip to tail Poplar with high density stringers through the center of the board, creating explosive pop and response! Groomers, deeps, steeps, chutes, glades, the Roots will dominate them all. The biradial sidecut slices into even sheet ice and holds its line, while the slightly raised contact points help avoid those nasty edge grab takedowns. Biax on top Triax underneath, rubber foil to dampen the landings on the big hits, Full tip to tip edge to edge Poplar core, Rockwell inserts, and ABS sidewalls. This is a dream construction. Profile: CRCX Full rocker in the center to free up your contact points for catch free riding and serious float in powder, is then paired with mild camber in the tip and tail for explosive pop and tons of added control. Construction: DD2 Core The new DD2 core is the lightest core in our line. Featuring hand selected Poplar that runs tip to tail, there’s no particle board, presswood, wafers, or other inferior products that you find in many of the other boards on the market. We then add high density wood stringers that run through the middle of the board to add increased response and explosive pop. A true all mountain core with maximum durability! Outline: Directional Twin Inserts set slightly back on the board allow for exceptional float in powder and intense performance in the most challenging terrain while allowing riders to still easily ride switch should they choose. Warranty: 3 Years A three year warranty against manufacturer defects allows you to charge and know that this board will perform for years to come.

DESCRIPTION: From slushy park laps to fresh tree runs, the Nitro Women's Fate Flat Out Snowboard destroys everything on the mountain with its extremely stable, more forgiving Flat Out Profile. Taking the edge off the board's responsive flex, the totally flat profile ensures high-speed stability and easy-carving prowess without being as catchy as traditional camber boards. Slightly set-back for straight-line confidence and extra float in powder, the Fate's directional twin shape lends itself to riding everything on the mountain, all without sacrificing its ability to ride and land switch in the park. Ultimately, this makes the board well-suited for intermediate-to-expert riders looking to hone their skills from open bowls to park kickers and jibs. Equipped with a PowerLite core, the Fate features ultra-lightweight poplar wood for loads of pop and unmatched strength when you're thrashing this board from peak to park. Its Reflex core profile thins out the board between the bindings to help you transition from edge to edge easier without extra torsional stiffness hindering your turn initiation. Bi-Lite laminates guarantee buttery-smooth flex for quick turns when you're banking between tight wood runs, carving up groomers, and navigating crowded slopes. Plus, the Sintered Speed Formula HD base easily reaches maximum velocity when you're launching bigger kickers and racing your friends down the mountain.
NAME: Nitro Fate Flat Out Snowboard - Women's

DESCRIPTION: EZ-Flat Rocker- Flat camber profile with gently rockered nose and tail just outside of the inserts makes for a smooth and stable ride by reducing chatter. Freestyle your way through any park, pipe or all over the mountain. Biaxial-A smooth, easy, torsional feel, the majority of the fibers are in the 0 axis to add extra pop and an easy torsional flex to the board. Easy carving for all-mountain or park performance. Truflex-Similar to the ReFlex core, TruFlex core technology features a high strength-to-weight wood construction utilizing different density poplar woods uniquely profiled to give you excellent all-around response when riding the mountain. EZDT Sidecut-Designed for EZ-Rock and another version of EZ FlatRock, the EZDT is mellow between the bindings and at the tips with a more aggressive grip in the binding areas. This creates a more forgiving ride when things get a bit bumpy and a tight radius blended for quick carves. Optix 2000-A high-density, extruded base that is extremely easy to maintain and fix. DESCRIPTION: Take your freestyle moves from the streets to the backcountry on the Nitro Afterlife Snowboard. This board was designed for park rats who love jibs and jumps, but are also ready to start riding outside the gates and hucking tricks into powder. Nitro's Cam-Out profile features a mellow version of camber with early transitions to provide the pop and edge hold of camber, but with a more forgiving feel and smoother turn initiation. The Urban flex is soft for easy pressing and buttering, as well as surfy pow turns but won't wash out on you when you're hitting jumps. Biax fiberglass provides a buttery flex for getting loose on jibs and making smooth turns, and beefy RailKiller edges are 20% thicker than standard edges so they can take a beating when you're throwing down in the streets. The lightweight Powercore II poplar core features inlaid beech strips for extra strength, and it has Whiplash profiling so it's thinner between the bindings for maximum pressibility and thicker underfoot for durability. The extruded base is easy to repair when you ding it up on gritty streets or hidden stumps beneath the snow.
NAME: Nitro Afterlife Snowboard Mens

DESCRIPTION: New for this season, the Rome Buckshot Snowboard is the brainchild of freestyle wizards Toni Kerkela and Ozzy Henning. Built to handle their explosive riding styles, this board was built to grease rails in the streets, link lines in the park, and catch air off any and all takeoffs it comes across.When designing this board, Toni and Ozzy demanded pop, pop, and more pop. So Rome obliged by giving the Buckshot a classic camber profile to help you load up ollies and boost off lips. Then, Rome added a bamboo rod milled into the core for an extra-snappy feel. Toni and Ozzy have also been known to gap to a seriously huge rail or two in their time, so Rome threw in Basalt Impact Plates to reduce board breakage next to the bindings. Impact edges are beefier so they can stand up to repeated rail hits, and the SinterTrue base keeps you moving fast when you need speed to keep your line going.

DESCRIPTION: Camp Seven Redwood and Summit Men's Snowboard Package : The newest board in the Camp Seven line, the Redwood will help you learn to dominate the entire mountain. Camp Seven Redwood RCRX Snowboard : Centered around an all new RCRX rocker camber rocker story, the Redwood has strategically placed rocker zones in the tip and tail to prevent those pesky edge catches and to provide a smooth comfortable ride. Then an elongated camber section under foot provides intuitive responsiveness and maximum edge hold on even the iciest days! The core of the Redwood has been upgraded to the ultra light and responsive Dual Density with Edgelock! This new core adds high density stringers down the center of the board for extra pop and response. Then more high density stringers are strategically placed down each edge of the board to help drive through any snow conditions without losing grip, all while adding extra protection to the rail. Simply put, the Redwood is a responsive and playful board designed to progress your riding across the entire mountain. The 3 year warranty provides comfort in knowing that your new board is as sturdy as its name! Profile : RCRX Rocker Camber Rocker RCRX : An elongated camber section under foot for optimal contact length with just enough rocker in the tip and tail for a catch free ride in the flats. Camp Seven Summit Bindings : The newest addition to the Camp Seven line with all upgraded hardware, the Summit comes ready for snowy combat on the mountain! One of the lightest, stylish and yet most durable bindings we carry, the Summit offers unparalleled performance. It has an absolute wish list of features. Full length EVA base pad. Either-Or toe strap that can be ridden toe cap style or over the forefoot. Gel insert contoured straps.

At the heart of the Mission EST Bindings is a glass+nylon base with a medium-stiff flex for any-run performance. DESCRIPTION: Camp Seven Drifter Snowboard : The Drifter has been upgraded and refined to perfection! An all new hybrid design, the Drifter features the new CRCX camber profile. The CRCX is a rocker dominate "camber-rocker-camber" profile which greatly increases float in powder and elevates your contact points to ensure you never catch an edge. The small cambered sections in the nose and tail only engage when you tell them to, and create explosive pop for ollies and jumps. Then we took our lightest core, the Dual Density Poplar DD2, and added our atrisan grade heartwood stringers to the rail for our Bash X finish. This creates the strongest construction possible and helps drive your edge in to snow and ice with ease. A twin design makes this board at home riding regular or switch. Add in biax over triax fiberglass construction and you get insane durability, and the smoothest flex pattern imaginable. Profile: Camber Rocker Camber CRCX: An all new design, this is a rocker dominant "camber-rocker-camber" profile. Overall rocker creates tons of float in powder and prevents edge catches for a super smooth ride. Small sections of camber in the tip and tail add explosive pop and increases the effective edge making high speed turns a breeze. Construction: DD2 with Bash X Our most popular and lightest weight dual density DD2 Core with maximum edge hold and durability! Starting with hand selected Poplar that runs tip to tail, there’s no particle board, presswood, wafers, or other inferior products that you find in many of the other boards on the market. We then add artisan grade heartwood stringers down each edge of the board. Designed to take a beating from even the most intense riders, the added rail strength also drives your edges harder and deeper in to even the iciest snow! If you’re looking for edge hold and control over the entire mountain, this is the core for you!
NAME: Camp Seven Drifter CRCX Men's Snowboard 2018

DESCRIPTION:
Hop aboard and breeze through the learning curve with performance and progression. Flow`s Viper will give you confidence in your riding and sets the tone with its Tru-Twin shape, hybrid rocker profile and soft flexing feel. Designed for riders who are looking to take their riding to new levels.

FEATURES:

  • Flat-Rock Rocker
  • Tru-Twin
  • Tru-Flex Core
  • Biaxial Glass
  • EZ-DT Sidecut
  • Optix 2000 Base
  • Flex Rating: 2 (1 = softest/forgiving and 10 = stiffest/responsive in the Flow line)
Flat Rock
Flat camber profile with a gently rockered nose and tail just outside of the inserts makes for a smooth and stable ride by reducing chatter, and increases ease of initiating and linking turns.

Tru-Twin
Equal amounts of nose and tail and a centered sidecut allowing a rider the ability to ride in either direction.

Biaxial Glass
The special configuration of BiAxial glass design creates a smooth yet responsive feel and provides longitudinal pop and torsional freedom for easier turns and a naturally easy riding board. Some models have 7 strands of vertically stitched carbon stringers.

EZ-DT Sidecut
Designed for EZ-Rock and EZ-Flat Rock, the EZ-DT is mellow between the bindings and at the tips with a more aggressive grip in the binding areas. This creates a more forgiving ride when things get a bit bumpy and a tight radius blended for quick carves.

Opitx 2000
The Optix 2000 base is a low maintenance base with great strength and speed. Feel confident when ripping past your friends.
NAME: Flow viper snowboard sz 154 cm

DESCRIPTION: For the backcountry enthusiast that likes to swallow snow by the mouthful, the Rossignol XV Sushi LG Splitboard is a Xavier De Le Rue-designed pow-slayer that pays homage to Japan's legendary powder renaissance of the 1990s. The first thing you're likely to notice about the Sushi is its pow-friendly swallowtail design that keeps your weight distributed in the rear of the board, keeping the super-fat nose floating to the surface in all but the deepest conditions. But we all know that to get to the goods, sometimes you need to go through the bads, so the folks at Rossignol generously designed the sushi to include camber underfoot for stability, and rocker in the tip, to keep the nose on top of the deep. The lack of a pronounced tail can make stomping flat, harder landing an intimidating prospect, but if you treat the Sushi strictly as a pow stick for light, fluffy snow, you're unlikely to experience a better, more effortless ride.
NAME: Rossignol XV Sushi LG Split Snowboard 2018 - 145cm

DESCRIPTION: Dreamcatcher Women's Package : This package has caught every item you could dream of in a snowboarding package. The Dreamcatcher features a CRCX rocker dominate camber profile which allows for easy catch free riding and superior float on those dreamed of powder days. The all new CRCX profile provides the best of every camber story. A rocker dominate profile with mild camber in the tip and tail eliminates all edge catches while still providing maximum edge hold in the iciest conditions. Biax over biax laminates allow the board to easily flex and pop without sacrificing durabiltity. A dual density Poplar core completely surrounded by rubber dampening add strength to the board while reducing chatter. Profile: CRCX Full rocker in the center to free up your contact points for catch free riding and serious float in powder, is then paired with mild camber in the tip and tail for explosive pop and tons of added control. DESCRIPTION: The Rome Agent Snowboard is a legendary freestyle workhorse that's dependable for day-in, day-out abuse, regardless if you're sending park hits, perfecting your jib skills, or dropping wind-lips above treeline. Ideal for the experienced freestyle rider, the Agent features traditional camber, which amplifies pop and control when you're snapping off every hit in sight and railing precise turns on a dime. Its smooth, mid-level flex and directional twin shape lend freestyle versatility across the entire mountain. Ultimately, the Agent is a great choice for the rider seeking one board for nearly any condition or terrain you'll encounter over the season. Creating a lightweight, lively feel, the SuperPop Core Matrix combines long popular wood segments with three densities of ultra-light wood. Carbon Single Barrel Hotrods are milled directly into the board's nose and tail, anchored only at the ends near the insert packs. This allows them to flex dynamically like a spring board for amplified snap. Z-Tech 1. 0 places a one-inch strip of Zylon down the board's centerline. Zylon is a lightweight material that's stronger than carbon, enhancing response without reducing playfulness. Another impressive feature, Impact Edges feature thicker steel to stand up to serious thrashings.
NAME: Rome Snowboards Agent Snowboard

DESCRIPTION: When untracked snow is the priority, split boards are the simplest solution to getting buried in deep face shots. In designing our Whiteroom, we had two goals. One was to create a board that floats and surfs effortlessly. The other was to create a board that had power in the tail for slashing with a lot of force. To achieve both we armed our Powder-S rocker/positive hybrid camber with two TurboRods of carbon in the tail. Float into a line and explode pillows of snow.

DESCRIPTION: One of the most popular boards in the line, Salomon's The Villain Snowboard features plenty of goodness to get any advanced level rider to become a true all-mountain evil genius. Built with a Rock Out Camber profile you'll have stability between your bindings, camber near the feet for response and a rocker tip and tail for presses. The Equalizer RAD Sidecut provides the perfect blend of agility and fun and the Popster Booster Construction maximizes pop. DESCRIPTION:
Product Description
The I/O continues to redefine the market. Easily interchanged lenses, amazing field of view, impressive comfort, and fog-free optical technology create a better experience than any other goggle out there.
				    	
					
Amazon.com
 SMITH OPTICS VAPORATOR SERIES I/O SNOW GOGGLE The Vaporator Series I/O snow goggle is built to log serious alpine hours--maintaining comfort and clarity in extreme environments. The I/O offers easily interchanged lenses and comes with two performance mirror lenses included to match conditions on the hill. The spherical lens combines with Vaporator technology to offer an amazing field of view, impressive comfort, and fog-free optics. The medium-fit goggle is helmet compatible with an easy to adjust silicone backed strap for custom comfort. Quick Release Lens System QuickFit Strap Adjustment System with Clip Buckle KEY FEATURES:  Medium Fit Patented Vaporator Lens Technology with Porex Filter Spherical, Carbonic-X Lens with TLT Optics Spherical Lens increases interior volume for fog-free vision 5X Anti-Fog Inner Lens Includes Two Performance Mirror Lenses Quick Release Lens System 3-Layer, DriWix Face Foam Ultra-Wide, Silicone Backed Strap QuickFit Strap Adjustment System with Clip Buckle Helmet Compatible Includes Microfiber Goggle Bag with Replacement Lens Sleeve Lifetime Warranty  VAPORATOR LENS TECHNOLOGY WITH POREX FILTERPatented Vaporator lens technology utilizes processes previously reserved for aerospace and medical capacities. These lenses are robotically cut and bonded together with an airtight silicone bead to eliminate lens delamination--the number one cause of between-the-lens fogging.A micro-porous filter called Porex completes the system. Its composition is structured such that air molecules may pass through the filter while water molecules cannot. By utilizing this filter, the thermal lens is allowed to adjust to varying altitudes while preventing moisture from entering the space between the lenses creating an amazingly strong thermal lens barrier. CARBONIC X LENS Carbonic-X outer lenses are individually molded to offer optimum scratch and impact resistance, increased visual acuity, and enhanced contrast sensitivity. The inner lens is impregnated with Fog-X lens treatment for increased anti-fog performance. The Carbonic-X lens meets Class 1 optical standards as well as ANSI Z87.1 standards. With SMITH TLT Distortion-free rays straight to your eyeWithout SMITH TLT Refracted rays to your eyeTAPERED LENS TECHNOLOGY (TLT)When light passes through a medium--such as a lens it refracts, i.e. changes course. If left uncorrected, this refraction can cause visual distortion and eye fatigue. Smith’s TLT straightens out the incoming light rays by progressively tapering the lens from the optical center toward the peripheral view. What this means for you is that you see with accuracy and increased comfort.
NAME: Smith Optics Mens IO Goggles, Forest Woolrich/Green Sol-X Mirror Red Sensor Mirror - OS

DESCRIPTION: From the hard single-pitch splitters of Indian Creek to the soaring alpine walls of the Charakusa Valley, the Black Diamond Chaos harness is a highly durable, premium trad climbing harness that's built for long routes and serious abuse. Equally suited to cragging sessions and multi-pitch free climbs, the Chaos features Kinetic Core Construction, which uses a thin layer of Vectran fibers in place of traditional webbing to evenly distribute weight across the waist and legs. Four pressure-molded gear loops hold cams, slings and on-route essentials, and the front two loops are oversized for optimized racking. A Forged Speed Adjust buckle makes for easy on and off, while the rear 12 kN-rated haul loop secures your tag line.Kinetic Core ConstructionEmploying a tri-laminate of Vectran polymer, Kinetic Core Construction is not the next step in harness design - it's a quantum leap forward. Almost all harnesses use one or two strands of narrow structural webbing, resulting in thin lines of tension that require thick foam padding to alleviate pressure points. Kinetic Core Construction eliminates this requirement by distributing the load evenly throughout the harness's entire structure, a design idea not far in principle from our original Alpine Bod harness. The result is the Ozone, Aura, Chaos, and Xenos: harnesses that are dramatically sleeker, lighter and more comfortable than any other harness ever made.
NAME: Black Diamond Chaos Harness

DESCRIPTION: There's no point in beating around the bush: the Tecnica Mach1 130 LV Men's Ski Boot is a hard-charging, take-no-prisoners, race-bred freeride boot that's not particularly interested in slowing down, taking it easy, or just cruising. In addition to a burly 130 flex, well-defined heel pockets, taller cuffs, and pre-punched navicular areas, the Mach1 boasts the same 98mm last and easy on/off Quick-Instep Max overlap construction featured on Tecnica's World-Cup-conquering Inferno boots. This construction is key, since it makes the Mach1 perfect for lower-volume feet (hence the LV) or even more precise for skiers who are looking for the ultimate performance fit. The sculpted polyether shell provides a snugly confident fit around the foot, while the stiff polyester cuff gives the power to conquer big lines and big drops at high speed without worrying about feeling loose, soft, or wobbly in your boots. Tecnica designed the Custom Adaptive Shape (C. A. S.) UltraFit Pro Race liner to exactly match the contours of the shell, giving you a seriously precise and powerful out-of-the-box fit that won't pack out after half a season like traditional liners tend to do. The LV uses a thinner and more responsive liner than the classic Mach1 for more sensitivity and less chance that it will pack out and get sloppy. The C. A. S. liner is also designed to be heat molded for a fine-tuned fit, giving you the ability to rip in comfort from the first chair to the last run. A fat 45mm power strap lets you cinch everything down for snug and powerful feel, and the Mach1's subtle canting and flex adjustments give you the ability to dial your stance. When the TechniGrip soles wear out, you can replace them for more grip and surer binding release and retention, or you can swap them out for a full-length pre-canted sole to address any alignment problems you're having. If you like to push your skiing and need a boot that can keep up, the Mach1 130 LV is a pretty damn good bet.
NAME: Tecnica Mach1 130 LV Boot

DESCRIPTION: The Soul 7 HD from Rossignol is back and better than ever! How did Rossignol improve upon an already super popular, high performing freeride all mountain ski? With a whole new tip concept and shape that really changes the feel of the ski. The Soul 7 HD has always been famous for its maneuverability and relative ease of use. It has become a go-to ski for trees, moguls, and really any kind of off-piste terrain, but also retains solid performance on groomed slopes. It’s an all mountain ski geared toward the more freeride-oriented, playful skier. For 2018 Rossignol is introducing their Air Tip 2.0. This new tip is both lighter and stronger thanks to the fact that it extends further into the core of the ski and also uses brand new, symmetrical reinforcements that run all the way to the tip. The result is a ski that is just as maneuverable as it’s always been, but is now significantly more stable, quieter at speed, and overall smoother. Anyone that’s been a fan of the Soul 7 in past seasons will still absolutely love it, but the changes to the new ski do make it hold up to more aggressive skiing much better than the previous skis, so the Soul 7 HD may find its way into some new ski quivers.
NAME: Rossignol Soul 7 HD Skis 2018

DESCRIPTION: The new Nordica NXT N2W is a great boot for the advanced to expert skier that wants a boot that has power and comfort, that best fits ladies that have a medium to wide forefoot, and medium sized shaft of the leg. The N2W has Nordica's PFP Precision Fit Liner that has a specific fit just for women, and will resist packing out more than just a recreational boot, so you will get long lasting performance and comfort. The size of the cuff is adjustable with the ACP that is located in the calf area that will the quick turn of the wrench will help you get the fit of the cuff dialed in just perfectly. A flex of 95 is on the stiffer side, so it will require some power and technique to be able to deliver control to your skis, but it will be supportive at fast speeds. DESCRIPTION:
Product Description
The new Giro Section combines the look of a traditional skate-style helmet with the light weight of in-mold technology for urban commuting, dirt jumping, and trail-riding.
				    	
					
Amazon.com
The skate-style Giro Section multi-sport helmet is a great choice for a wide range of activities, from urband commuting to mountain biking to dirt jumping. Its low-profile shape is distinct yet minimal, and because the shell and EPS liner are integrated though the in-mold construction process, it's nicely lightweight.   The front of the helmet has also been optimized with Giro's Super Fit technology to work great with our sunglasses and goggles. And with a wide range of graphics, there's a Section to suit any taste or preference.   In-Mold Construction In-mold construction fuses a tough polycarbonate outer shell with the helmet's impact-absorbing foam liner. The fusion process allows Giro to sculpt better ventilation systems, so in-mold helmets can be lighter and cooler than traditional helmets. Wind Tunnel Ventilation Giro helmets are developed utilizing its proprietary Wind Tunnel ventilation system, which combines active vents with internal exhaust channels that thrust cool, fresh air over and around the riders head-while forcing heat and stale air out. This significant increase in air channeling makes a difference that riders will immediately feel and appreciate. Super Fit Engineering A great helmet is so comfortable that once it's on, it virtually disappears. Our proprietary three-size Super Fit system is based on "human scale factors" data and over 20 years of crafting helmets for the best bike riders in the world. The result is pure Skull Hugging Luxury, a helmet that fits 98 percent of the world's population, yet looks (and fits) like it was custom made just for you.  Specifications: Suggested use: Urban/Commute, Dirt Jump, All-Mountain Features: Low-profile fit, light weight, Wind Tunnel Ventilation Construction: In-mold EPS liner, polycarbonate shell Ventilation: 8 vents
NAME: Giro Section Bike/Multi-Sport Helmet

DESCRIPTION: If you're going to become a star, you're going to take some shots, and you don't want to be a mumbling idiot in all your movie-part interviews because you've rattled your dome too many times. Because they care about your cerebellum as much as you do, Sandbox designed the Legend Helmet with an ABS hard shell and EPS impact foam liner to absorb the blows that would otherwise beat your neurons to a pulp. Sandbox can't guarantee that your interviews won't consist mainly of the words "dude," "bro," "like," and "gnarly," but they can promise that you'll be able to use the crazy number of pad adjustments to dial in the perfect fit, and rock a low-profile look that will make you stand out by helping you blend in. The Legend also has fully removable pads so you can rock it all summer long, and a goggle-friendly fit designed to eliminate gaper gap so you can focus on not shorting that step-up you spent all last week building.
NAME: Sandbox Legend Helmet

DESCRIPTION: The POC Fornix Helmet provides ultimate protection in a lightweight and well-ventilated construction. POC has used the Aramid bridge concept, initially developed for the ground breaking Trabec trail helmet and optimized it for the Fornix structure. By applying Aramid in strings and molding them together with the foam liner, the helmet is kept lightweight but at the same time offers increased stability and protection and provides better energy absorption. The ventilation system is built on 6 vents at the top using a sliding plate for easy opening/ closing, as well as front and rear vents in order to allow air to easily flow through the construction. The front of the helmet is designed not only to seamlessly integrate with your goggles, but also to prevent your goggles from fogging. Vertical vents that channel the air downwards achieve this. The Fornix helmet is equipped with a turn-ring size adjustment system so you can dial it in to achieve that perfect fit.
NAME: POC Fornix Helmet

DESCRIPTION: We took the performance aspects of Mod 5 and tailored the styling for a more lifestyle look. The Modular Brim System (MBS) provides the same benefits and fit as Mod 5. Unlike traditional ear pads, our design puts zero pressure on your ears allowing for more comfort and better hearing. Removable design allows for wearing the strap over or under the helmet.

From the skate park to the terrain park, the Holt has you covered with smooth style and an all-season, convertible pad kit.Bombshell Ear PadsRemovable Goggle Lock14 VentsBombshell ConstructionAirflow Climate ControlAirEvac VentilationConvertible Pad Kit Included For Year-Round UseSkullcandy Audio Systems AvailableSIZING: + X-Small 52-54 cm + Small 54-56 cm + Medium 56-58 cm + Large 58-60 cm + X-Large 60-62 cmCERTIFICATION: ASTM F 2040, CE EN 1077:2007 CLASS B, CPSC CE EN 1078WEIGHT: 19 oz / 545 grams2013 Model

   Smith's AirEvac system generates maximum airflow and via air channels built into the helmet.   The innovative, all-weather Holt helmet, from active sports gear maker Smith Optics, can be customized with the included convertible pad kit to keep your lid warm on the winter slopes, and cool in the summer skate park.  Temperature and moisture management, in both helmet and goggles, is the single most important factor in enjoying a day of riding, and Smith Optic's Dual Regulator ventilation system independently controls both front and rear sections of venting. By exhausting heat through the rear vents while maintaining a sealed front end, your body is able to effectively cool down when needed, but avoid the dreaded "ice cream headache" caused by cold air blasting against your forehead. Additionally, Smith's AirEvac system generates maximum airflow and removes warm, fog-causing air via air channels built into the helmet, keeping your head dry and your goggles clear. The system is especially effective when pairing a Smith helmet with Smith goggles.  Smith's renowned, impact resistant Bombshell Construction utilizes an injection molded ABS shell to ensure superior durability against dents and dings while, of course maximizing head protection. An optional Skullcandy Audio System (sold separately) completely integrates into the helmet's padding, letting you listen to your favorite playlist while riding the rails or half pipe walls.     Smith helmets and goggles are designed to work together to remove warm, moist air and prevent fogging.   Features and Specifications  Convertible Pad Kit included for year-round use Bombshell construction and ear pads Removable goggle lock 14 vents Airflow climate control AirEvac ventilation Skullcandy audio system compatible (sold separately) ASTM F 2040, CE EN 1077:2007 Class B, and CPSC certified 19-ounce weight   Lifetime Warranty This Smith Optics helmet includes a limited lifetime manufacturer's warranty against defects in materials and workmanship.

DESCRIPTION: As its name suggests, the DSP Sport is a trimmed-down version of the DSP Pro, with a super-simple one-button interface that gives you only three options—send, search, and flag. Just slide the side switch to toggle between transmitting and receiving, and mark burials using the flag button. When you've flagged a signal, the three antennas automatically switch to the nearest unflagged signal for streamlined searching. The Sport has a 50m circular search range and a smart transmitter that, during a burial, automatically switches to the antenna with the clearest broadcasting range, minimizing dead spots and signal traps that can drastically reduce a beacon's effectiveness. A simple, clear display makes the Sport easy to learn and even easier to use. It has a distance readout, a directional arrow, multiple-burial indicators, and a battery-life display, which provide all the necessary information without cluttering the screen.
NAME: Black Diamond Pieps DSP Sport Avalanche Beacon, One Size

DESCRIPTION:
Product Description
Walk confidently on icy surfaces with this pair of ICEtrekkers Chains. Like tire chains for your feet, the chains are perfect for all snow conditions, including snow, slush and packed and crusty surfaces. The durable links are individually TIG welded and made from case hardened steel. The traction stems from the unique ladder pattern under the ball of the foot combined with the triangular pattern on the heel, which provides stable footing and is comfortable for extended wear. Plus, the chains' hearty rubber sling attaches securely to almost any footwear type, so you can wear them with running shoes, hiking boots and even dress shoes. The sling, which stays flexible in subzero temperatures, also keeps the chains from falling off even in deep snow.

DESCRIPTION: Put the pedal to the metal and head out for winter fun. STABILicers Heel cover the critical heel zone and are ideal for driving vehicles or pedaling your fat-tire bike, while giving you critical stability in ice, snow, and all winter terrain. The fully integrated Tension-Fit Binding secures the device firmly to boots and shoes. The heel-only design is lightweight and extremely durable, they’re easy to take on and off, and store in a glove box or coat pocket – season after season. Our Mission: At STABIL, stability, traction and performance are more than just product attributes; they’re words we live by. Every day. Only through stability can a company earn the trust of its customers. Only through traction can our hard work and efforts be realized. And only through the performance of our dedicated employees can we all prosper. Made in the USA:Proudly made in Maine, USA for over 25 years, our decision to produce our own products in the USA is based on a number of factors, yet most importantly, our own values. The bottom line is that our quality and service remains without compromise; thus yielding a true reflection of who we are as a company and people.About Us: Harsh winter weather conditions should never prevent you from enjoying the outdoors. STABIL has been the leading manufacturer of traction footwear for nearly three decades. Based in Biddeford, Maine, we have continued to innovate our original product and have expanded our offerings to suit a wide range of recreational outdoor pursuits. More recently, we have taken on commercial applications with our STABIL Grippers, designed for restaurants, food processing, and cleaning services, just to name a few. No matter what the environment has in store for you, STABIL will never let you down.
NAME: STABILicers STABIL HEEL Traction Ice Heel Cleat with Steel Cleats and Tread for Snow, Ice, Attaches over Shoes and Boots for Safety in Outdoor Winter Weather and Slippery Terrain, OS

More recently, we have taken on commercial applications with our STABIL Grippers, designed for restaurants, food processing, and cleaning services, just to name a few.
